msgs.text:
Clear and concise Bitcoin FAQ laid out in a Twitter thread
https://twitter.com/BitFaqs/status/1519932850035998720?s=20&t=G0Ip7o_qGrVnfk9xfH_ROg

BTC Lexicon - Comprehensive Bitcoin knowledge base including a glossary
https://www.btclexicon.com/

Bitcoin glossary put together by Bitcoin Magazine. Find brief definitions of Bitcoin related words and phrases here 
https://bitcoinmagazine.com/bitcoin-glossary

Calendar of Bitcoin Events and Celebrations January 3 *Proof of Keys Day* The birthday of Bitcoin (2009), PoK Day exists to cement the unique attributes of Bitcoin, to take your coins off of exchanges and make sure everyone holds their Bitcoin themselves. April 28 *Satoshi Disappear Day* https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=6730.0 May 22 *Bitcoin Pizza Day* See this post for details on the celebration: August 1 *Bitcoin Independence Day* The official end of the Blocksize Wars. On August 1, 2017, Bitcoin users demonstrated their independence from miner control by successfully deploying a software upgrade through a user-activated soft fork (UASF) that circumvented uncooperative miners, making it clear that users (ie nodes), not miners or companies, control the rules of the Bitcoin network. August 21 *Bitcoin Infinity Day* Inspired by Knut Svanholm's "Everything Divided by 21 Million." Stack 21 times your normal daily average stack More Bitcoin holidays by NVK: https://bitcoin.holiday/
Spirit of Satoshi - AI chat bot - ask any question about Bitcoin:
